Class SimpleQueriesProcessor

java.lang.Object
  net.metarelate.terminology.utils.SimpleQueriesProcessor

public class SimpleQueriesProcessor
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of static methods to query an RDF graph (just a convenience)

getRequiredResourceObject

public static com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource getRequiredResourceObject(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource resource,
                                                                           com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Property property,
                                                                           com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
                                                                    throws NonConformantRDFException
Returns the resource object in a statement with the specified subject/property. If no matching statement is found throws an exception. If more than one maching statement is found returns a random result.

Parameters:
resource - the subject
property -
model -
Returns:
Throws:

getOptionalConfigurationParameterSingleValue

public static java.lang.String getOptionalConfigurationParameterSingleValue(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model configuration,
                                                                            com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Property parameter)
Returns a value from a configuration parameter, and null if no value is found. If more values for a parameter are given, a random one is returned. The system is agnostic respect to the type of parameter values, that are converted to string via their default method.

Parameters:
configuration - : the configuration graph
parameter - : the parameter sought
Returns:

getOptionalConfigurationParameterSingleValue

public static java.lang.String getOptionalConfigurationParameterSingleValue(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model configuration,
                                                                            java.lang.String parameter)
Returns a literal in a statement having the specified property. If no literal can be found returns null If more literals can be found returns a random result

Parameters:
configuration - the graph
parameter - the property
Returns:
